remarks: Lemma for ~ nlmvscn .  Compare this proof with the similar elementary proof ~ mulcn2 for continuity of multiplication on ` CC ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
statement:
nlmvscn.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
nlmvscn.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
nlmvscn.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
nlmvscn.d $e |- D = ( dist ` W ) $.
nlmvscn.e $e |- E = ( dist ` F ) $.
nlmvscn.n $e |- N = ( norm ` W ) $.
nlmvscn.a $e |- A = ( norm ` F ) $.
nlmvscn.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
nlmvscn.t $e |- T = ( ( R / 2 ) / ( ( A ` B ) + 1 ) ) $.
nlmvscn.u $e |- U = ( ( R / 2 ) / ( ( N ` X ) + T ) ) $.
nlmvscn.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. NrmMod ) $.
nlmvscn.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. RR+ ) $.
nlmvscn.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. K ) $.
nlmvscn.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
nlmvscn.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. K ) $.
nlmvscn.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
nlmvscn.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( B E C ) < U ) $.
nlmvscn.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( X D Y ) < T ) $.
nlmvscnlem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( B .x. X ) D ( C .x. Y ) ) < R ) $.
